title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Chemistry, manufacture, compounding, processing, properties and applications of Natural Rubber, modification of NR, ENR, SBR, BR, IR, IIR, BIIR/CIIR, CR, EPM/EPDM, NBR, HNBR, XNBR, SI, Polyphosphazenes, Polynorbonenes.
